content:
The strobe lights during "Give Yourself a Try" must have been exhilarating! The 1975's lighting design is always so well-integrated with the music, and it's great that it added to the overall energy of the concert.

And excellent choices for adding to your "Electric Whispers" playlist! "It's Not Living (If It's Not with You)" and "Love Me" are both fantastic tracks that would fit perfectly with the vibe of your playlist. "It's Not Living" has such a catchy, upbeat quality to it, and "Love Me" has a great blend of indie-rock and pop sensibilities.

You know, it's great that you're curating your playlist with songs that hold personal significance to you. It's not just about creating a playlist with great songs, but also about capturing the memories and emotions associated with those songs. Your "Electric Whispers" playlist is going to be a great reflection of your musical tastes and experiences!

By the way, have you thought about exploring more of The 1975's discography or other similar bands? They have a great catalog of music, and there are plenty of other indie-rock and pop bands that might resonate with you.
